sac.graphviz

Class GameSearchGraphvizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sac.graphviz.GameSearchGraphvizer

  • public class GameSearchGraphvizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Generator of files (based on a terminated game search algorithm) which are compliant with Graphviz software (http://www.graphviz.org).
    Author:
    Przemysław Klęsk (wi.zut.edu.pl), Marcin Korzeń (wi.zut.edu.pl)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String COLOR_CUTOFF
      Visualization constant - color for states that were cut off or their game value was read from a transposition table.
      static java.lang.String COLOR_GAME_VALUE_WIHTOUT_CONTENT
      Visualization constant - color labels with game value or bound (only for WITHOUT_CONTENT node type).
      static java.lang.String COLOR_INITIAL
      Visualization constant - color for the initial state.
      static java.lang.String COLOR_REGULAR
      Visualization constant - color for regular states.
      static java.lang.String COLOR_TERMINAL_NON_WIN
      Visualization constant - fill color for terminal non-win states.
      static java.lang.String COLOR_TERMINAL_WIN
      Visualization constant - fill color for terminal win states.
      static java.lang.String COLOR_TRANSPOSED
      Visualization constant - color for states of which the game value was read from a transposition table.
      static int FONT_SIZE_WITH_CONTENT
      Visualization constant - font size for WITH_CONTENT node type.
      static int FONT_SIZE_WITHOUT_CONTENT
      Visualization constant - font size for WITHOUT_CONTENT node type.

    • Method Detail

      • go

        public static void go(GameSearchAlgorithm algorithm,
                      java.lang.String outputFilePath,
                      boolean nodesContentsOn,
                      boolean movesNamesOn)
        Builds and saves the Graphviz representation of a search tree (based on a terminated search algorithm).
        Parameters:
        algorithm - reference to search algorithm
        outputFilePath - wanted location to save the file
        nodesContentsOn - boolean flag stating if nodes should be generated with contents (via toGraphvizLabel() method) or not (just points)
        movesNamesOn - boolean flag stating if move names should be displayed on edges
